quotes.quote: Just keep being true to yourself, if you're passionate about something go for it. Don't sacrifice anything, just have fun.
Be true to yourself. Make each day a masterpiece.
Live your life in your own unique way and be true to yourself.
Be true to your work, your word, and your friend.
Truth can be stated in a thousand different ways, yet each one can be true.
Be true to your heart... put your whole heart and soul into it, and then whatever you do, it will shine through.
Pretend and it will be true.
Your only obligation in any lifetime is to be true to yourself.
Being true to yourself really means being true to all the complexities of the human spirit.
Be true, and thou shalt fetter time with everlasting chain.
Nothing has to be true, but everything has to sound true.
You make your mark by being true to who you are and letting that be your staple.
What is really beautiful must always be true.
Not being known doesn't stop the truth from being true.
A truth ceases to be true when more than one person believes in it.
It's very easy to say that something is a shadow of itself, and it may be true in some senses.
Always tell the truth and be true.
Unlikely things are often true.
It's important to be true to yourself and your vision.
To be true to ourselves, we must be true to others.
Satisfaction doesn't come from needs and desires or fulfilling them, it comes from being yourself, being true.
The truer you are to yourself, the greater your gifts will manifest themselves.
Be true to yourself. If you follow that principle, a lot of decisions are actually pretty easy.
Sometimes, being true to yourself means changing your mind. Self changes, and you follow.
Stay true in the dark, and humble in the spotlight.
Believe it to be true and meet yourself there.
Things we wish to be true are apt to gain too ready credit with us.

Be true to yourself, stay focused and stay you, take advice from other folks, use what you can, but never mind what is not for you. For the most part, trust yourself and believe in what you are doing.
Be true to what matters most to your heart.
It is true if you believe it to be true.
